version_description:
1. Optimized application interface and interaction to enhance user experience

2. Increased the entry effect of the distinguished users, making the experience more cool

3. Added the verhicle mall mall, users can choose their favorite car

4. Open the setting of the chat limit word count

5. Modified some bugs

• Add event voting function
Our events are now very attractive and cheerful.
• Add screen announcement
Send a message to users via their app screen
• Strengthen the audit function
When users encounter content that is offensive or not allowed to stream in our platform, users can choose to Report or Add to Blacklist. We will warn or lock the user.
• Strengthen the Black function.
When a user are in you Blacklist, they could not send messages to you.

1. Optimize the login and registration process.
2. Optimize the “swiping screen to switch livestream room” function.
3. Modify the private chat function. Add new function to receive private messages from the system.
4. Optimize the family icon in livestream room.
5. Add the “Families list” feature in user information page.

5. Add the “Families list” feature in user information page.

1. Modify 1st time install app bug: country area code does not show country flag
2. Optimize the scrolling logic of the home banner
3. Fix homepage event banners crashing bug 
4. New splash screen
5. Facebook users under the age of 18 are prohibited from registering and logging in

- Added translation function to allow users and broadcasters in different languages to communicate smoothly;
- Added check-in function to give more rewards to active users daily;
- Optimized the guide instructions, so that new users can get familiar with the product functions faster.

- Replaced the live streaming push library SDK to improve the stability and immediacy of live streaming.
- Solved serious crash problems and errors.
- The beauty effect SDK has been replaced, and facial recognition gifts and gesture recognition gifts will be added later.

- Added Medal of Honor, each idol can receive a unique medal after participating in the event;
- Added the administrator toolbox, which can more conveniently deal with the problems encountered by the idols;
- The PK function comes back again;
- Optimized the guidance;
- Optimized the push&pull streaming nodes for live broadcast.

1. Newly added all-site gift fireworks. After the fireworks are set off, a portal is generated, and you can get a treasure chest of gold coins when you reach the designated room.
2. PK function optimization
3. Some UI detail adjustments
4.Add new subscription products
Red VIP automatic subscription service description:
·Subscription period: 1 month
·Price: 4.99$/month
· Payment: After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be credited to the iTunes account.
·Renewal: Purchase the account of a continuous monthly subscription member, and the iTunes account will be automatically deducted 24 hours before the expiration of each month and the membership validity period will be extended by 1 month.
·Cancel subscription: Please manually open the "Settings" of IOS -> enter "iTunes Store and App Store" -> click "Apple ID" -> select·Select "View Apple ID" -> enter "Account Settings" -> click " Subscribe", select "Red VIP" to cancel the subscription. If the subscription is not closed at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, the subscription will be automatically renewed.

Blue Crown automatic subscription service description:
·Subscription period: 1 month
·Price: 79.99$/month
· Payment: After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be credited to the iTunes account.
·Renewal: Purchase the account of a continuous monthly subscription member, and the iTunes account will be automatically deducted and extended by 1 month before the expiration of each month. The validity period of the monthly membership will be 5,800,000 cions.
·Cancel subscription: Please manually open the "Settings" of IOS -> enter "iTunes Store and App Store" -> click "Apple ID" -> select·Select "View Apple ID" -> enter "Account Settings" -> click " Subscribe", select "Blue Crown" to cancel the subscription. If the subscription is not closed at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, the subscription will be automatically renewed.
